primary name server for secondary zone

name.description: name of the record which should be a valid domain according to rfc1035 Section 2.3.4

ttl.description: time to live. If nothing provided we will set the zone ttl.

PartialUpdateRecordSetPayload.description: RRSetPatch for rr patch set info.

PartialUpdateRecordPayload.description: RecordPatch for record patch in record set.

adjustRecords.description: Adjust record set content and replace the dns name of the original zone with the new dns name of the cloned zone

description.description: New Description for the cloned zone. Leave empty to use the same description as the original zone

dnsName.description: DnsName is the dns name of the zone to clone

name.description: New Name for the cloned zone. Leave empty to use the same name as the original zone

active.description: if the record set is active or not

error.description: Error shows error in case create/update/delete failed

isReverseZone.description: if the zone is a reverse zone or not

primaries.description: primary name server for secondary zone

recordCount.description: record count how many records are in the zone

MoveZonePayload.description: body to move zone from one project to another.

code.description: Code to move the zone. It must be valid, not expired and belong

zoneDnsName.description: ZoneDnsName is the dns name of the zone to move

code.description: code to move the zone. It is one time shown so better keep it.

message.example: successfully created code to move the zone

ValidateMoveCodePayload.description: PostValidateMoveCodeRequest body to validate move code request.

code.description: code that should be validated. It validates if it is valid, not expired and belongs to the zone.
